citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on
05-Mar-20.
I called the licensee by phone when I arrived at the locked gate and left a message of the attempted inspection .

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am  on
05-Mar-20.
 I called the licensee by phone  when I arrived at the locked gate and left a message of the attempted inspection .
